text:
leagueapps.com - San Francisco, CA or greater Bay Area

LeagueApps is a rapidly growing SaaS platform powering local adult and youth sports leagues & events.

We're in need of a full stack developer skilled in Java, SQL, and Javascript.

More info here: http://leagueapps.theresumator.com/apply/WMUWVg/Senior-Softw...
